attributes.action: Stop the EU from telling us what shape our vegetables should be
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Supermarkets are not allowed under EU law to sell misshapen  vegetables. This is such a waste in today's environment of saving money and cost cutting.Fruit and Veg taste the same what ever it looks like.We should be more interested in feeding the people of this world no matter what the food looks like.Please allow supermarkets to sell ALL fruit and veg.
